title: Belen Santamarina
description: Belen Santamarina, Argentinian visual artist. Lives and works between London and Buenos Aires.

gallery.description: White panties embroidered with human hair lying on the rope in the garden. Belonging to the work My desire is a ghost.

Detail of bedsheet embroidered with human hair. Belonging to the work Migran-t, the embroidery shows the map of Argentina next to the United Kingdom map with the legend "Nor here, not there" in English and Spanish.
